The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #20744 ([POC] Use std::filesystem. Remove Boost Filesystem & System by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request impo

Concept ACK

However, this introduces a circular dependency right now:
```
A new circular dependency in the form of "fs -> random -> logging -> fs" appears to have been introduced.
```
> However, this introduces a circular dependency right now:\n\nI have changed the implementation. So this is fixed.
Concept ACK\n\nThanks for paving the way for further Boost removal!
I have left this intentionally very simple. One can certainly come up with many different ways to make this more robust but I would like to solicit for feedback for this.

In commit "Introduce GetUniquePath(base) helper method to replace boost::filesystem::unique_path() which is not available in std::filesystem." (1bca2aa694cd85984c09699ae28daec313077462)\n\nNot a problem but there is an extraneous whitespace change here
